text: Wrestling has been part of the Pan American Games since the 1951 Games in Buenos Aires, Argentina. ==Medal table== Updated until 2019 edition. ==See also== * Pan American Wrestling Championships == External links == * Wrestling at the Pan American Games * Sports123.com: Wrestling at the Pan American Games Category:Sports at the Pan American Games Pan American Games Category:Wrestling in North America Category:Wrestling in South America
title: Wrestling at the Pan American Games
